join
str_c(): 多個字串向量的合併(concatenate)
```{r}
month <- c("3","4","2")
day <- c("11","5","7")
char1 <- c("月","月","月")
char2 <- c("日","日","日")
month
char1
day 
char2
str_c(month,char1,day,char2)
str_c(month,c("月"),day,c("日"))
str_c(month,"月",day,"日")
str_c(month,day, sep="-")#seperation
str_c(month,day, sep="/")
```

split
```{r}
dates <- c("3-11", "4-5",  "2-7")
str_split(dates,"-")
```
replace
```{r}
str_replace(dates,"-","月")
dates2 <- c("3-11-2019", "4-5-2017",  "2-7-2015")
dates2
str_replace(dates2,"-","/")
str_replace_all(dates2,"-","/")
```

```{r}
library(readr)
githubData <- read_csv("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/tpemartin/github-data/master/githubData.csv")
username <- githubData$`GitHub username`[11:16]
reponame <- githubData$`GitHub repo name`[11:16]
```
